content.raw:
Hi @arif_rahman_my , Since this is a crash coming from a gazebo plugin I think it would fit better as an issue at the [gazebo_ros_pkgs repo](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs) where plugins like [libgazebo_ros_video.so](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_video.cpp) come from. This repo is for the gazebo simulator itself.

Would you mind creating an issue there? I'll close this for now, but would be happy to reopen it if it turns out to be an issue here.

Hi @arif_rahman_my , Since this is a crash coming from a gazebo plugin I think it would fit better as an issue at the gazebo_ros_pkgs repo where plugins like libgazebo_ros_video.so come from. This repo is for the gazebo simulator itself.

Would you mind creating an issue there? I'll close this for now, but would be happy to reopen it if it turns out to be an issue here.
